article_ref: Art. 10 Abs. 1 SVG, Art. 96, 124 Abs. 1, 136 Abs. 4, 162 Abs. 1, 167 und 185 VTS
law_text: Driving without required control plate(s) except dealer plates (Art. 10 Abs. 1 SVG, Art. 96, 124 Abs. 1, 136 Abs. 4, 162 Abs. 1, 167 und 185 VTS)
notes: Driving without required license plates (excluding trade plates).

law_text: Driving without a maximum speed sign (Art. 117 Abs. 2 und 144 Abs. 7 VTS)
notes: Driving a vehicle that requires but lacks the mandatory speed sign.

law_text: Driving without a rear marking plate (Art. 68 Abs. 4 VTS)
notes: Driving a vehicle that requires but lacks the mandatory rear marking plate (e.g., slow vehicles).

article_ref: Art. 140 Abs. 1 Bst. b und 148 Abs. 1 VTS
law_text: Operating a motorcycle without permanently attached reflectors (Art. 140 Abs. 1 Bst. b und 148 Abs. 1 VTS)

article_ref: Art. 4 i. V. m. Anlage B Ziff. 8.1.5 ADR
law_text: Carrying out a dangerous goods transport with a missing, incomplete or nonâ€‘compliant equipment component (Art. 4 i. V. m. Anlage B Ziff. 8.1.5 ADR)
notes: Missing, incomplete, or non-compliant equipment during dangerous goods transport.

article_ref: Art. 26, 74 Abs. 5, Art. 95 Abs. 3 und 4 VZV
law_text: Failure to report or to report in time facts that require a change or replacement of a permit or authorization (Art. 26, 74 Abs. 5, Art. 95 Abs. 3 und 4 VZV)
notes: Failure by the owner/holder to report changes requiring document modification or replacement.

law_text: Exceeding the prescribed deadline for mandatory emission service: up to 1 month
notes: Mandatory emissions service overdue up to 1 month.

law_text: Exceeding the prescribed deadline for mandatory emission service: more than 1 month but not more than 3 months
conditions: more than 1 month but not more than 3 months
notes: Mandatory emissions service overdue between 1 and 3 months.

law_text: Exceeding the prescribed deadline for mandatory emission service: more than 3 but not more than 6 months
conditions: more than 3 but not more than 6 months
notes: Mandatory emissions service overdue between 3 and 6 months.

law_text: Putting a motor vehicle into circulation with a defective tire (Art. 58 Abs. 4 VTS)
notes: Owner allowing a motor vehicle with faulty tires to be put into circulation.

law_text: Putting a trailer into circulation with a defective tire (Art. 58 Abs. 4 VTS)
notes: Owner allowing a trailer with faulty tires to be put into circulation.

law_text: Failure to attach the speed sign when using a vehicle with studded tires (Art. 62 Abs. 2 VTS)
notes: Owner failing to attach the required speed sign when studded tires are used.

law_text: Improper installation of the speed sign when using a vehicle with studded tires (Art. 62 Abs. 2 VTS)
notes: Non-compliant attachment of the speed sign when studded tires are used.

law_text: Failure to remove the speed sign although no studded tires are used (Art. 62 Abs. 3 VTS)
notes: Owner failing to remove the speed sign when studded tires are no longer used.

article_ref: Art. 10 Abs. 1 SVG, Art. 96, 124 Abs. 1, 136 Abs. 4, 162 Abs. 1, 167 und 185 VTS
law_text: Failure to attach the required control plate(s) except dealer plates (Art. 10 Abs. 1 SVG, Art. 96, 124 Abs. 1, 136 Abs. 4, 162 Abs. 1, 167 und 185 VTS)
notes: Failure by the owner to attach required license plates (excluding trade plates).

law_text: Improper installation of the control plates (Art. 45 Abs. 2, 96, 124 Abs. 1, 136 Abs. 4, 162 Abs. 1, 167 und 185 VTS)
notes: Non-compliant method of attaching license plates.

law_text: Failure to attach the maximum speed sign (Art. 117 Abs. 2 und 144 Abs. 7 VTS)
notes: Failure by the owner to attach the mandatory speed sign.
